author: blumm
msg: The jsp-files of "testsuite/src/webapp/jsp" use an old and wrong entry "taglib uri='/WEB-INF/tld/portlet.tld'". The current correct one is "	taglib uri='http://java.sun.com/portlet'". This has been corrected now.

author: nlothian
msg: Change HTML comments to JSP comments

author: taylor
msg: This statement fails if the portlet doesn't explicitly say that it supports VIEW mode
renderURL.setPortletMode(PortletMode.VIEW);
Portlets should always support View mode even if not explicity declared in the deployment
See PLT 8.1
I could have also fixed this in Jetspeed-2 by always adding the VIEW Portlet Mode
but figured we could also ensure correct behavior in all Pluto portals
btw - Is Pluto Jahia functional now?

author: blumm
msg: LOG:
TMP_PREFIX: Didn't need to be public, removed.  Replaced by INITIAL_TMP_PREFIX and FULL_TMP_PREFIX_LEN.
INITIAL_TMP_PREFIX: The initial portion of the web module prefix.
FULL_TMP_PREFIX_LEN:  The length of the full web module prefix.
WAR_FILE_EXT: Added JavaDoc.

resolveURI(String): Tweaked JavaDoc and indent level for formatting consistent with the rest of the file.  Adjusted for use of INITIAL_TMP_PREFIX and FULL_TMP_PREFIX_LEN constants in place of old TMP_PREFIX.
